recommended_degree: Administrasi, Administrasi Bisnis, Manajemen, Akuntansi, Akuntansi Manajemen (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Documentation of strategy and process in form creating, reviewing, revising, and/or updating Policy and/or Procedure within Finance-Operation-Funding Function.
2. Manage regular documentation cadence within Transformation & Strategy Department.
3. Analysis of existing process within Finance-Operation-Funding Function, identify improvement points, and define improvement & development plans.
